room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by MPower in San Jose
review: The puzzles in this escape room are great! We did The Cabin, and there were puzzles suited to the different skills of everyone in our group. I really enjoyed the atmosphere of the room, and I'm looking forward to their next room opening (early 2019, I think) so that we can go back for another round!

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by MPower in San Jose
review: I took my entire family for fathers day and we had an amazing time trying to escape from "The Cabin". After nearly an hour we made it. It was such a great time because MPOWER was very cleaver in their designing of the room and all the things you needed to do to escape. I would definitely suggest you give MPOWER a try, you will not regret it.

room_title: Escape room "The Cabin" by MPower in San Jose
review: Had an amazing time here! Finished The Cabin a few months ago and just finished The Secret. I can't wait for more rooms! Would definitely recommend to anyone!
